bitop_ex

Various extensions to core.bitop and std.bitmanip.

template UnsignedOfSameSizeAs(T)
Get an Unsigned Type of size as if possible.

@safe T makeBit(T, I...)(I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Returns:
Zero Instance T with :th Bit set.

@safe bool testBit(T, I...)(in T a, I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Returns:
Check if all :th Bits Of are set.

@trusted bool testBit(T, I...)(in T a, I bixs) if (!isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I));
Returns:
Check if all :th Bits Of are set.

bool testBit(T, I...)(in T* a, I bixs) if (!isIntegral!T && !is(T == size_t) && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Returns:
Check if all :th Bits Of are set.

@safe void setBit(T, I...)(ref T a, I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Test and sets the :th Bit Of to one.

Returns:
A non-zero value if the bit was set, and a zero if it was clear.

@safe void setBit(T, I...)(T* a, I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && !is(T == size_t) && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Test and sets the :th Bit Of to one.

Returns:
A non-zero value if the bit was set, and a zero if it was clear.

@trusted void setBit(T, I...)(ref T a, I bixs) if (!isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I) && I.length >= 1);
Returns:
Check if all :th Bits Of are set.

@safe void setLowestBit(T)(ref T a) if (isIntegral!T);
Set lowest bit of 
a
to one.

@safe void setHighestBit(T)(ref T a) if (isIntegral!T);
Set highest bit of 
a
to one.

@safe bool getLowBit(T)(T a) if (isIntegral!T);
Get lowest bit of 
a
.

@safe bool getHighBit(T)(T a) if (isIntegral!T);
Get highest bit of 
a
.

@safe void resetBit(T, I...)(ref T a, I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I));
Reset bits 
I
of 
a
(to zero).

@safe void resetBit(T, I...)(T* a, I bixs) if (isIntegral!T && !is(T == size_t) && allSatisfy!(isIntegral, I));
Reset bits 
I
of 
*a
(to zero).

I
of 
a
(to zero).
